alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Schoharie; Western Albany (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Albany and east central Schoharie Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 522 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middleburgh, or 11 miles southeast of Cobleskill, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Westerlo, Berne, Middleburgh, Schoharie, Livingstonville, Rensselaerville, East Berne, Shoefelt Corners, West Berne, Huntersland, Old Stone Fort, Smith Corner, West Fulton, Reidsville, Bramans Corners, Helderberg, Lambs Corner, Housons Corners, Zucks Corners and Snyders Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
